# Changelog

## [0.4.0](https://github.com/derhally/github-notify/compare/github-notify-v0.3.0...github-notify-v0.4.0) (2026-02-10)


### Features

* add GitHub-branded tray icons and notification sound support ([6cac4cb](https://github.com/derhally/github-notify/commit/6cac4cb962ab5d9abeec736327f509c060c904a8))
* **ci:** add GitHub Actions release workflow ([d85e69c](https://github.com/derhally/github-notify/commit/d85e69cfa29f2734ca01976a10aec3251ffe30a4))
* **ci:** enable auto-generated release notes ([33220b2](https://github.com/derhally/github-notify/commit/33220b26bc30c3aabf3207783b953bc47559ff04))
* initial GitHub PR notification tray app ([9271778](https://github.com/derhally/github-notify/commit/927177872f84bfe3195731133da0a150ba774305))


### Bug Fixes

* **ci:** correct PublisherGithub import casing ([b843c34](https://github.com/derhally/github-notify/commit/b843c34a1f629f364502b34cdbe600281e077d19))
* harden security, type safety, and remove dead code ([289832c](https://github.com/derhally/github-notify/commit/289832c1e75ea247eeac9f571a3ae8466a1a6333))
